src.engine.step5.rendering_functions module¶

src.engine.step5.rendering_functions.render_condition_template(schema, condition_code)[source]¶

Renders and returns the condition template with a column concept_id with the OMOP CDM standard code for condition_code and its descendents.

Parameters

  • schema (str) – Schema name of the database.

  • condition_code (str) – Code of the condition in ICD10CM

Returns

Rendered subquery with input arguments.

Return type

str

src.engine.step5.rendering_functions.render_drug_template(schema, drug_code)[source]¶

Renders and returns the drug template with a column concept_id with the OMOP CDM standard code for drug_code and its descendents.

Parameters

  • schema (str) – Schema name of the database.

  • drug_name (str) –

Returns

Rendered subquery with input arguments.

Return type

str

src.engine.step5.rendering_functions.render_ethnicity_template(schema, ethnicity_name)[source]¶

Renders and returns the ethnicity template with a column concept_id with the OMOP CDM standard code for ethnicity_name.

Parameters

  • schema (str) – Schema name of the database.

  • ethnicity_name (str) – Ethnicity name as it appears in OMOP CDM standard concepts.

Returns

Rendered subquery with input arguments.

Return type

str

src.engine.step5.rendering_functions.render_gender_template(schema, gender_name)[source]¶

Renders and returns the gender template with a column concept_id with the OMOP CDM standard code for gender_name.

Parameters

  • schema (str) – Schema name of the database.

  • gender_name (str) – Gender name as it appears in OMOP CDM standard concepts.

Returns

Rendered subquery with input arguments.

Return type

str

src.engine.step5.rendering_functions.render_race_template(schema, race_name)[source]¶

Renders and returns the race template with a column concept_id with the OMOP CDM standard code for race_name.

Parameters

  • schema (str) – Schema name of the database.

  • race_name (str) – Race name as it appears in OMOP CDM standard concepts.

Returns

Rendered subquery with input arguments.

Return type

str

src.engine.step5.rendering_functions.render_state_template(schema, state_acronym)[source]¶

Renders and returns the ethnicity template with a column concept_id with the OMOP CDM standard code for ethnicity_name.

Parameters

  • schema (str) – Schema name of the database.

  • state_acronym (str) – Acronym of the state as it appears in OMOP CDM standard concepts.

Returns

Rendered subquery with input arguments.

Return type

str
